mn12:3.4: Takkapariyahatam samano gotamo dhammam deseti vimamsanucaritam sayampatibhanam.
mn12:3.5: Yassa ca khvassa atthaya dhammo desito so niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
mn12:3.6: Atha kho ayasma sariputto vesaliyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn12:3.8: So vesaliyam parisati evam vacam bhasati:
mn12:3.10: Takkapariyahatam samano gotamo dhammam deseti vimamsanucaritam sayampatibhanam.

mn12:5.1: Ayampi hi nama, sariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa mayi dhammanvayo na bhavissati:

mn12:6.1: Ayampi hi nama, sariputta, sunakkhattassa moghapurisassa mayi dhammanvayo na bhavissati:
mn12:6.2: ‘itipi so bhagava anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti; avibhavam, tirobhavam; tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati, seyyathapi akase; pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam karoti, seyyathapi udake; udakepi abhijjamane gacchati, seyyathapi pathaviyam; akasepi pallankena kamati, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno; imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina parimasati parimajjati; yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti’ti.

mn12:36.1: Nirayancaham, sariputta, pajanami, nirayagaminca maggam, nirayagamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.2: yatha patipanno ca kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
mn12:36.3: Tiracchanayonincaham, sariputta, pajanami, tiracchanayonigaminca maggam, tiracchanayonigamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.4: yatha patipanno ca kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapajjati tanca pajanami.
mn12:36.5: Pettivisayancaham, sariputta, pajanami, pettivisayagaminca maggam, pettivisayagamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.6: yatha patipanno ca kayassa bheda param marana pettivisayam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
mn12:36.7: Manusse caham, sariputta, pajanami, manussalokagaminca maggam, manussalokagamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.8: yatha patipanno ca kayassa bheda param marana manussesu upapajjati tanca pajanami.
mn12:36.9: Deve caham, sariputta, pajanami, devalokagaminca maggam, devalokagamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.10: yatha patipanno ca kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati tanca pajanami.
mn12:36.11: Nibbanancaham, sariputta, pajanami, nibbanagaminca maggam, nibbanagamininca patipadam;
mn12:36.12: yatha patipanno ca asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati tanca pajanami.
mn12:37.1: Idhaham, sariputta, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:37.2: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjissatiti.
mn12:37.3: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapannam, ekantadukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:37.4: Seyyathapi, sariputta, angarakasu sadhikaporisa pura angaranam vitaccikanam vitadhumanam.
mn12:37.5: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito ekayanena maggena tameva angarakasum panidhaya.
mn12:37.6: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso disva evam vadeyya:
mn12:37.7: ‘tathayam bhavam puriso patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha imamyeva angarakasum agamissati’ti.
mn12:37.8: Tamenam passeyya aparena samayena tassa angarakasuya patitam, ekantadukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:37.9: Evameva kho aham, sariputta, idhekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:37.10: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho yatha kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjissatiti.
mn12:37.11: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapannam, ekantadukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:38.1: Idha panaham, sariputta, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:38.2: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapajjissatiti.
mn12:38.3: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapannam, dukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:38.4: Seyyathapi, sariputta, guthakupo sadhikaporiso, puro guthassa.
mn12:38.5: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito ekayanena maggena tameva guthakupam panidhaya.
mn12:38.6: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso disva evam vadeyya:
mn12:38.7: ‘tathayam bhavam puriso patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho yatha imamyeva guthakupam agamissati’ti.
mn12:38.8: Tamenam passeyya aparena samayena tasmim guthakupe patitam, dukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:38.9: Evameva kho aham, sariputta, idhekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:38.10: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapajjissatiti.
mn12:38.11: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapannam, dukkha tibba katuka vedana vedayamanam.

mn12:39.3: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana pettivisayam upapannam, dukkhabahula vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:39.4: Seyyathapi, sariputta, rukkho visame bhumibhage jato tanupattapalaso kabaracchayo.

mn12:41.1: Idha panaham, sariputta, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
mn12:41.2: ‘tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissati’ti.
mn12:41.3: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapannam, ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:41.4: Seyyathapi, sariputta, pasado, tatrassa kutagaram ullittavalittam nivatam phusitaggalam pihitavatapanam.
mn12:41.5: Tatrassa pallanko gonakatthato patikatthato patalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharano sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakupadhano.
mn12:41.6: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito ekayanena maggena tameva pasadam panidhaya.
mn12:41.7: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso disva evam vadeyya:
mn12:41.8: ‘tathayam bhavam puriso patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha imamyeva pasadam agamissati’ti.
mn12:41.9: Tamenam passeyya aparena samayena tasmim pasade tasmim kutagare tasmim pallanke nisinnam va nipannam va ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:41.10: Evameva kho aham, sariputta, idhekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:41.11: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho yatha kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjissatiti.
mn12:41.12: Tamenam passami aparena samayena dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapannam, ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:42.1: Idha panaham, sariputta, ekaccam puggalam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami—
mn12:42.2: tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissatiti.
mn12:42.3: Tamenam passami aparena samayena asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharantam, ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:42.4: Seyyathapi, sariputta, pokkharani acchodaka satodaka sitodaka setaka supatittha ramaniya.
mn12:42.6: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito ekayanena maggena tameva pokkharanim panidhaya.
mn12:42.7: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso disva evam vadeyya:
mn12:42.8: ‘tatha bhavam puriso patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha imamyeva pokkharanim agamissati’ti.
mn12:42.9: Tamenam passeyya aparena samayena tam pokkharanim ogahetva nhayitva ca pivitva ca sabbadarathakilamathaparilaham patippassambhetva paccuttaritva tasmim vanasande nisinnam va nipannam va, ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:42.10: Evameva kho aham, sariputta, idhekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
mn12:42.11: ‘tathayam puggalo patipanno tatha ca iriyati tanca maggam samarulho, yatha asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissati’ti.
mn12:42.12: Tamenam passami aparena samayena asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharantam, ekantasukha vedana vedayamanam.
mn12:43.1: Yo kho mam, sariputta, evam janantam evam passantam evam vadeyya:
mn12:43.3: takkapariyahatam samano gotamo dhammam deseti vimamsanucaritam sayampatibhanan’ti
mn12:43.4: tam, sariputta, vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
mn12:43.5: Seyyathapi, sariputta, bhikkhu silasampanno samadhisampanno pannasampanno dittheva dhamme annam aradheyya; evam sampadamidam, sariputta, vadami
mn12:43.6: tam vacam appahaya tam cittam appahaya tam ditthim appatinissajjitva yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
mn12:44.1: Abhijanami kho panaham, sariputta, caturangasamannagatam brahmacariyam carita—
mn12:44.2: tapassi sudam homi paramatapassi, lukho sudam homi paramalukho, jegucchi sudam homi paramajegucchi, pavivitto sudam homi paramapavivitto.
mn12:45.1: Tatrassu me idam, sariputta, tapassitaya hoti—acelako homi muttacaro hatthapalekhano, naehibhaddantiko natitthabhaddantiko; nabhihatam na uddissakatam na nimantanam sadiyami.
mn12:45.2: So na kumbhimukha patigganhami, na kalopimukha patigganhami, na elakamantaram, na dandamantaram, na musalamantaram, na dvinnam bhunjamananam, na gabbhiniya, na payamanaya, na purisantaragataya, na sankittisu, na yattha sa upatthito hoti, na yattha makkhika sandasandacarini; na maccham na mamsam na suram na merayam na thusodakam pivami;
mn12:45.3: so ekagariko va homi ekalopiko, dvagariko va homi dvalopiko …pe… sattagariko va homi sattalopiko;
mn12:45.4: ekissapi dattiya yapemi, dvihipi dattihi yapemi …pe… sattahipi dattihi yapemi;
mn12:45.5: ekahikampi aharam aharemi, dvihikampi aharam aharemi …pe… sattahikampi aharam aharemi; iti evarupam addhamasikampi pariyayabhattabhojananuyogamanuyutto viharami.
mn12:45.6: So sakabhakkho va homi, samakabhakkho va homi, nivarabhakkho va homi, daddulabhakkho va homi, hatabhakkho va homi, kanabhakkho va homi, acamabhakkho va homi, pinnakabhakkho va homi, tinabhakkho va homi, gomayabhakkho va homi, vanamulaphalaharo yapemi pavattaphalabhoji.
mn12:45.7: So sananipi dharemi, masananipi dharemi, chavadussanipi dharemi, pamsukulanipi dharemi, tiritanipi dharemi, ajinampi dharemi, ajinakkhipampi dharemi, kusacirampi dharemi, vakacirampi dharemi, phalakacirampi dharemi, kesakambalampi dharemi, valakambalampi dharemi, ulukapakkhampi dharemi;
mn12:45.13: iti evarupam anekavihitam kayassa atapanaparitapananuyogamanuyutto viharami.
mn12:46.1: Tatrassu me idam, sariputta, lukhasmim hoti—
mn12:46.2: nekavassaganikam rajojallam kaye sannicitam hoti papatikajatam.
mn12:46.3: Seyyathapi, sariputta, tindukakhanu nekavassaganiko sannicito hoti papatikajato, evamevassu me, sariputta, nekavassaganikam rajojallam kaye sannicitam hoti papatikajatam.
mn12:46.4: Tassa mayham, sariputta, na evam hoti:
mn12:46.5: ‘aho vataham imam rajojallam panina parimajjeyyam, anne va pana me imam rajojallam panina parimajjeyyun’ti.
mn12:47.1: Tatrassu me idam, sariputta, jegucchismim hoti—
mn12:47.2: so kho aham, sariputta, satova abhikkamami, satova patikkamami, yava udakabindumhipi me daya paccupatthita hoti:
mn12:48.1: Tatrassu me idam, sariputta, pavivittasmim hoti—
mn12:48.2: so kho aham, sariputta, annataram arannayatanam ajjhogahetva viharami.
mn12:48.3: Yada passami gopalakam va pasupalakam va tinaharakam va katthaharakam va vanakammikam va, vanena vanam gahanena gahanam ninnena ninnam thalena thalam sampatami.
mn12:48.5: Ma mam te addasamsu ahanca ma te addasanti.
mn12:48.6: Seyyathapi, sariputta, arannako mago manusse disva vanena vanam gahanena gahanam ninnena ninnam thalena thalam sampatati;
mn12:48.7: evameva kho aham, sariputta, yada passami gopalakam va pasupalakam va tinaharakam va katthaharakam va vanakammikam va vanena vanam gahanena gahanam ninnena ninnam thalena thalam sampatami.
mn12:48.9: Ma mam te addasamsu ahanca ma te addasanti.
mn12:49.1: So kho aham, sariputta, ye te gottha patthitagavo apagatagopalaka, tattha catukkundiko upasankamitva yani tani vacchakanam tarunakanam dhenupakanam gomayani tani sudam aharemi.
mn12:49.2: Yavakivanca me, sariputta, sakam muttakarisam apariyadinnam hoti, sakamyeva sudam muttakarisam aharemi.
mn12:50.1: So kho aham, sariputta, annataram bhimsanakam vanasandam ajjhogahetva viharami.
mn12:50.2: Tatrassudam, sariputta, bhimsanakassa vanasandassa bhimsanakatasmim hoti—
mn12:50.3: yo koci avitarago tam vanasandam pavisati, yebhuyyena lomani hamsanti.
mn12:50.4: So kho aham, sariputta, ya ta rattiyo sita hemantika antaratthaka himapatasamaya tatharupasu rattisu rattim abbhokase viharami, diva vanasande;
mn12:50.5: gimhanam pacchime mase diva abbhokase viharami, rattim vanasande.
mn12:50.6: Apissu mam, sariputta, ayam anacchariyagatha patibhasi pubbe assutapubba:
mn12:51.1: So kho aham, sariputta, susane seyyam kappemi chavatthikani upadhaya.
mn12:51.2: Apissu mam, sariputta, gamandala upasankamitva otthubhantipi, omuttentipi, pamsukenapi okiranti, kannasotesupi salakam pavesenti.
mn12:51.3: Na kho panaham, sariputta, abhijanami tesu papakam cittam uppadeta.
mn12:52.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:52.5: Te kolampi khadanti, kolacunnampi khadanti, kolodakampi pivanti—
mn12:52.7: Abhijanami kho panaham, sariputta, ekamyeva kolam aharam aharita.
mn12:52.8: Siya kho pana te, sariputta, evamassa:
mn12:52.10: Na kho panetam, sariputta, evam datthabbam.
mn12:52.11: Tadapi etaparamoyeva kolo ahosi seyyathapi etarahi.
mn12:52.12: Tassa mayham, sariputta, ekamyeva kolam aharam aharayato adhimattakasimanam patto kayo hoti.
mn12:52.13: Seyyathapi nama asitikapabbani va kalapabbani va; evamevassu me angapaccangani bhavanti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.14: Seyyathapi nama otthapadam; evamevassu me anisadam hoti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.15: Seyyathapi nama vattanavali; evamevassu me pitthikantako unnatavanato hoti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.16: Seyyathapi nama jarasalaya gopanasiyo oluggavilugga bhavanti; evamevassu me phasuliyo oluggavilugga bhavanti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.17: Seyyathapi nama gambhire udapane udakataraka gambhiragata okkhayika dissanti; evamevassu me akkhikupesu akkhitaraka gambhiragata okkhayika dissanti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.18: Seyyathapi nama tittakalabu amakacchinno vatatapena samphutito hoti sammilato; evamevassu me sisacchavi samphutita hoti sammilata tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.19: So kho aham, sariputta, ‘udaracchavim parimasissami’ti pitthikantakamyeva parigganhami, ‘pitthikantakam parimasissami’ti udaracchavimyeva parigganhami, yavassu me, sariputta, udaracchavi pitthikantakam allina hoti tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.20: So kho aham, sariputta, ‘vaccam va muttam va karissami’ti tattheva avakujjo papatami tayevappaharataya.
mn12:52.21: So kho aham, sariputta, tameva kayam assasento panina gattani anomajjami. Tassa mayham, sariputta, panina gattani anomajjato putimulani lomani kayasma patanti tayevappaharataya.

mn12:53-55.22: So kho aham, sariputta, ‘vaccam va muttam va karissami’ti tattheva avakujjo papatami tayevappaharataya.

mn12:56.1: Tayapi kho aham, sariputta, iriyaya taya patipadaya taya dukkarakarikaya najjhagamam uttarim manussadhamma alamariyananadassanavisesam.
mn12:56.3: Imissayeva ariyaya pannaya anadhigama, yayam ariya panna adhigata ariya niyyanika, niyyati takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya.
mn12:57.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:57.3: Na kho pana so, sariputta, samsaro sulabharupo yo maya asamsaritapubbo imina dighena addhuna, annatra suddhavasehi devehi.
mn12:57.4: Suddhavase caham, sariputta, deve samsareyyam, nayimam lokam punaragaccheyyam.
mn12:58.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:58.3: Na kho pana sa, sariputta, upapatti sulabharupa ya maya anupapannapubba imina dighena addhuna, annatra suddhavasehi devehi.
mn12:58.4: Suddhavase caham, sariputta, deve upapajjeyyam, nayimam lokam punaragaccheyyam.
mn12:59.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:59.3: Na kho pana so, sariputta, avaso sulabharupo yo maya anavutthapubbo imina dighena addhuna, annatra suddhavasehi devehi.
mn12:59.4: Suddhavase caham, sariputta, deve avaseyyam, nayimam lokam punaragaccheyyam.
mn12:60.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:60.3: Na kho pana so, sariputta, yanno sulabharupo yo maya ayitthapubbo imina dighena addhuna, tanca kho ranna va sata khattiyena muddhavasittena brahmanena va mahasalena.
mn12:61.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:61.3: Na kho pana so, sariputta, aggi sulabharupo yo maya aparicinnapubbo imina dighena addhuna, tanca kho ranna va sata khattiyena muddhavasittena brahmanena va mahasalena.
mn12:62.1: Santi kho pana, sariputta, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn12:62.2: ‘yavadevayam bhavam puriso daharo hoti yuva susukalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa tavadeva paramena pannaveyyattiyena samannagato hoti.
mn12:62.3: Yato ca kho ayam bhavam puriso jinno hoti vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, asitiko va navutiko va vassasatiko va jatiya, atha tamha pannaveyyattiya, parihayati’ti.
mn12:62.4: Na kho panetam, sariputta, evam datthabbam.
mn12:62.5: Aham kho pana, sariputta, etarahi jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, asitiko me vayo vattati.
mn12:62.6: Idha me assu, sariputta, cattaro savaka vassasatayuka vassasatajivino, paramaya satiya ca gatiya ca dhitiya ca samannagata paramena ca pannaveyyattiyena.
mn12:62.7: Seyyathapi, sariputta, dalhadhamma dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katupasano lahukena asanena appakasireneva tiriyam talacchayam atipateyya,
mn12:62.8: evam adhimattasatimanto evam adhimattagatimanto evam adhimattadhitimanto evam paramena pannaveyyattiyena samannagata.
mn12:62.9: Te mam catunnam satipatthananam upadayupadaya panham puccheyyum, puttho puttho caham tesam byakareyyam, byakatanca me byakatato dhareyyum, na ca mam dutiyakam uttari patipuccheyyum.
mn12:62.10: Annatra asitapitakhayitasayita annatra uccarapassavakamma, annatra niddakilamathapativinodana apariyadinnayevassa, sariputta, tathagatassa dhammadesana, apariyadinnamyevassa tathagatassa dhammapadabyanjanam, apariyadinnamyevassa tathagatassa panhapatibhanam.
mn12:62.11: Atha me te cattaro savaka vassasatayuka vassasatajivino vassasatassa accayena kalam kareyyum.
mn12:62.12: Mancakena cepi mam, sariputta, pariharissatha, nevatthi tathagatassa pannaveyyattiyassa annathattam.
mn12:63.1: Yam kho tam, sariputta, samma vadamano vadeyya:
mn12:63.2: ‘asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’ti, mameva tam samma vadamano vadeyya
mn12:63.3: ‘asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan’”ti.
mn12:64.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagasamalo bhagavato pitthito thito hoti bhagavantam bijayamano.
mn12:64.2: Atha kho ayasma nagasamalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn12:64.4: Api hi me, bhante, imam dhammapariyayam sutva lomani hatthani.
mn12:64.6: “Tasmatiha tvam, nagasamala, imam dhammapariyayam lomahamsanapariyayotveva nam dharehi”ti.
mn12:64.8: Attamano ayasma nagasamalo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
